document.heading: School Safe Passage Emergency Zone Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-232, the “School Safe Passage Emergency Zone Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-555, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 20, 2010, and May 4, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 19, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-402 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-232 became effective on October 2, 2010.
